revision.text:
{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Luxuryball |image = [[File:Luxuryball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Luxuryball''. |price = Variable |catchTime = 1s |catchRate = 0% |location =
*[[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] }} ==Description== The '''Luxuryball''' is a type of [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Pokéball active and there is a remaining supply in the Pokéball selector. ==Details== A specialized Pokéball to capture Pokémon with, it provides no increased catch rate bonus and catches Pokémon in 1.25s. It is functionally equivalent to a Pokéball. ==Acquisition== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{ItemPrice|[[Berry Master#Trades|Goldenrod City]]|20 - 40 Random [[File:Cheri.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 1 Berries|Gen 1 Berries]]
5 - 15 Random [[File:Persim.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 2 Berries|Gen 2 Berries]]
5 - 10 Random [[File:Pomeg.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 3 Berries|Gen 3 Berries]]}} |} |}
{{Pokéballs}}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Pokéballs]]
